dt: {bc}someone who sniffs a drug or other substance in order to become intoxicated
{bc}a dog that is trained to recognize and follow scents especially for the purpose of locating people or contraband (such as illicit drugs and explosives)

dt.t: Use your {wi}sniffer{/wi} to detect unattractive or unhealthy odors.

shortdef: someone who sniffs a drug or other substance in order to become intoxicated
a dog that is trained to recognize and follow scents especially for the purpose of locating people or contraband (such as illicit drugs and explosives)
